name: Gari Network
description: GARI Network is a crypto-powered creator economy on Chingari. It's the leading web3 social network with over 140M+ app downloads, 5M+ DAU, 40M+ MAU, and on-chain 775K+ wallets. The GARI token incentivizes content creators to produce genuine content while keeping viewers and participants engaged with transparent tipping features, exclusive content, and direct participation in platform operations.
